</s>[INST] Extract the language the invoice is mostly written in and the company name.

Output the information as a XML object. Create only the XML object. Do not provide explanations or additional notes. 

Map the language to the field 'invoice.language' and the issuer name to the field 'cdtr.name'.

Here is an example of a XML Object:

<invoice>
  <invoice.language>English<invoice.language>
  <cdtr.name>Kraxi GmbH</cdtr.name>
</invoice>

Note: The company name is the name of the company that issued the invoice document, not the recipient and it is not "alpha trans Luft- und Seefrachtspedition GmbH & Co. KG". The company name is usually at the beginning or end of the invoice document.

Note: Do not generate any other information instead of the XML object.

[/INST]
